metadata.synopsis: one liner for the rich human male from the Bloomridge paranoia vignette
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Go to 199, 35, -62- Talk to the angry human from the vignette.

0.speaker: Bastian d'Zinn
0.text: Soft living has bred low morals in this city. I'll bet an intrepid adventurer like yourself has never stooped to take a handout, unlike half of this lot.
0.context: NodeContext: Complimenting the player, while still being a stuck-up ass

1.speaker: Bastian d'Zinn
1.text: You're one of the rabble they write about in Baldur's Mouth, aren't you? I will not be seen associating with the likes of you.

2.speaker: Bastian d'Zinn
2.text: Lord Gortash will make things right. The good old days will be back - at least for those who deserve them.

3.speaker: Bastian d'Zinn
3.text: It seems the articles have the measure of you then - a thorough troublemaker. Begone!

4.speaker: Bastian d'Zinn
4.text: This city has been in a downward spiral for too long - only the soft-hearted and the street vermin dare to deny it.

5.speaker: Bastian d'Zinn
5.text: Aren't you one of those adventurers hailed in Baldur's Mouth? I should dearly like to see some of this rabble learn from your example.
5.context: NodeContext: Complimenting the player, while still being a stuck-up ass
